name: Lumberjack Greedy
description:
Your tribe has found a nice place to live, but you are poor!

You must go to the Forest to cut down all the trees you can so that your village can Sell them. Who knows, with luck you will find Chests in the forest.

Collect, Upgrade your Sawmill and Bench to get resources, Upgrade your equipment to be more efficient.

Complete Daily Quests and earn Achievements to get special rewards.

Hundreds of hours of fun await you.
